events.name: Sobbing Intern
events.description: An intern has broken down in tears over the state of the factory.

choices.text: Comfort them personally [+2 Employee Morale, -1 Prestige]
Send them to the break room [-1 Employee Morale]

events.name: Rotten Egg Surprise
events.description: A shipment of rotten eggs has arrived.

choices.text: Use them in the noodles [+3 Spice Level, -2 Prestige, -1 Prestige]
Throw them out [+1 Corporate Compliance, +1 Prestige]

events.name: Overtime Whistle
events.description: The overtime whistle blows, and chaos ensues! Do you embrace the madness or try to restore order?

choices.text: Embrace the chaos [+2 Chaos Level, -1 Prestige]

events.name: Noodle Slap
events.description: A rogue noodle has slapped an employee! Do you discipline the noodle or reward it?

choices.text: Discipline the noodle [+1 Corporate Compliance, +1 Prestige]
Reward the noodle [-2 Corporate Compliance, -2 Prestige]

events.name: Pasta Prestige
events.description: Your factory has been nominated for the Pasta Prestige Award!

choices.text: Prepare a grand speech [+3 Employee Morale, +5 Prestige]

events.name: Chaos Reigns
events.description: The factory is in complete disarray! Do you take charge or let the chaos unfold?

choices.text: Let chaos reign [+3 Chaos Level, -3 Prestige]

events.name: Noodles Come Alive
events.description: Your noodles have gained sentience! Do you negotiate with them or try to contain them?

choices.text: Contain the situation [-2 Prestige, +2 Chaos Level]
